sentences.en: Any good heavily - used program needs good reference documentation, and BASH is no exception.
sentences.cn: 凡是使用率高的好程序都需要好的参考文档, BASH也不例外.

sentences.en: Fixed Knight Bash so it no longer works on Heroes.
sentences.cn: 修正了骑士的重击技能,使其正确的不对英雄产生影响.

sentences.en: He gave me a bash on the eyes.
He's prepared to have a bash at discussing it intelligently.
sentences.cn: 他已经准备好尽量巧妙地讨论这个问题。

sentences.en: I am doubtful whether I could ever learn English, but I'm determined to have a bash at it.
sentences.cn: 不晓得我能不能学会英语, 但是我决心试试看.

sentences.en: I particularly like the various versions the Bash debugger that were implemented completely as shell scripts.
sentences.cn: 我特别喜欢各种版本的Bash调试器,完全像shell脚本一样执行.

sentences.en: I've never tried water - skiing before, but I'd love to have a bash at it.
sentences.cn: 我以前从未做过滑水运动, 但是我倒愿意试一试.

sentences.en: If someone tried to bash my best mate they would have to bash me as well.
sentences.cn: 如果谁想揍我最好的朋友，那我就跟他拼了。

sentences.en: It also uses Shield Bash on a random nearby target.
sentences.cn: 并能对附近目标随机使用盾击.

sentences.en: Police bashed down the door to get in.
Someone bashed him on the back of his head.
The butt of a rifle had been used to bash in his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨是被来复枪的枪托砸伤的。

sentences.en: Their ambitions are to bash out good grub with minimal fuss.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标就是尽可能省劲地大量供应可口饭菜。

sentences.en: Too many golfers try to bash the ball out of sand. That spells disaster.
sentences.cn: 太多高尔夫球手都想把球从沙子里敲出来，结果酿成了一场灾难。

sentences.en: We bash the standards of English of young people all the time.
sentences.cn: 我们经常批评年轻人的英语水平.

sentences.en: We got at 2:00 a.m. from our company's bash.
sentences.cn: 我们2点才从公司的狂欢会回到家里.

sentences.en: Wild Rose Ro + Se Increases maximum life. Adds physical damage on bash.
sentences.cn: 野玫瑰增加生命值上限, 在猛击时增加物理伤害值.

trans.tran_cn: 重击，猛撞，痛快的玩乐[消遣]，<英方>尝试

trans.tran_en: to hit someone or something hard, in a way that causes pain or damage

trans.tran_cn: 严厉地，威胁地批评指责
痛击，猛击，严厉批评，怒殴
